desc: Sensory toys and tools for children with Autism to learn and play with a fresh variety of new items. Delivered to your doorstep, every month. Approved and hand selected by a passionate behavioural therapist. Sensory toys can help your child focus and stimulate the brain in a fun way from the comfort of your home.

layout.text: Sensory toys and learning tools for your child to engage with during learning, therapeutic and everyday play. Delivered to your doorstep, every month.
